s: We love our feet. Big feet, small feet, baby feet, all feet. They take us through life's precious moments, help us stand taller and keep us firmly connected to the world we love. You may call it a foot thing, but we like to call it a love thing. It's a warm and cozy, cuddle up comfort thing.
